name: Freaky Frenzy
description:
Freaky Frenzy is a bite-sized, reaction-based co-ordination game! Featuring 10 unique stages and an infinite high-score mode. Can YOU beat the final level?

Eat the target number of green bugs in each level while avoiding eating the purple ones. Achieve perfect scores to Gold Star a level!

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys/WASD: Open Each Mouth.
Esc: Pause Game.

In Menus:
‘Q’ to return to Main Menu.
‘R’ to restart the current level.
[SPACE] to continue to next level.
